Lets load in the dataset and appropriate libraries

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(Seurat)
library(patchwork)
library(ggplot2)
library(SoupX)
library(DropletUtils)
fluData = load10X("1905WT/outs")
nonExpressedGeneList = list(flugenes = c("PB1_mRNA", "PB2_mRNA", "PA_mRNA", "HA_mRNA", "NP_mRNA", "NA_mRNA", "M_mRNA", "NS_mRNA" ))
useToEst = estimateNonExpressingCells(fluData, nonExpressedGeneList = nonExpressedGeneList, clusters= FALSE)
fluData = calculateContaminationFraction(fluData, nonExpressedGeneList, useToEst = useToEst)

out = adjustCounts(fluData)

```


```{r}
DropletUtils:::write10xCounts("strainedCounts/1905WT", out)
```
